programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Ed Begley, Jr. (9/28/84)
programme.desc: Ed Begley Jr. is joined by Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom's Kate Capshaw and comedian Bobby Kelton.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (1/12/79)
programme.desc: Was Richard Pryor’s grandmother really a tyrant? Hear Pryor’s recollections of grandma battle ax.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Goldie Hawn (2/22/78)
programme.desc: The star of Laugh-in and Oscar winner Goldie Hawn talks about giving birth. Buck Henry has some thoughts.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Father Guido Sarducci (2/28/86)
programme.desc: Father Guido Sarducci stops by the set to talk about his pet dog and starting his own church.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Bob Hope (12/21/78)
programme.desc: Merry Christmas, Mr. Hope! Bob says he’s spending the holiday with his grandkids in Reno.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Patrick Swayze (10/13/87)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze discusses Dirty Dancing, plus Johnny interviews A. Whitney Brown and Alexandra Paul.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (5/4/77)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor chats about his California-style divorce and Chevy Chase discusses his Gerald Ford impression.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Jerry Seinfeld (4/24/84)
programme.desc: When was your last laugh over pay phones or tux rentals? Jerry Seinfeld catches you up.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Jack Lemmon (11/1/89)
programme.desc: The laughs can't stop/won't stop when comedy heavyweights Jack Lemmon and Steven Wright stop by the set.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '90s - Drew Carey (1/10/92)
programme.desc: Drew Carey talks about cold weather and global warming. Fellow guests are David Steinberg and Regis Philbin.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Clint Eastwood (5/15/92)
programme.desc: Mr. “make-my-day” Clint Eastwood reminisces about Gunsmoke, Outlaw Josey Wales and Dirty Harry.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Jim Fowler (7/23/80)
programme.desc: Jim Fowler brings out an alligator and crocodile. Plus, Rodney Dangerfield has Johnny in stitches.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - John Travolta (8/6/81)
programme.desc: Actor/pilot John Travolta on flying lessons, dropping out of high school and getting his first part.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Carnac (1/10/80)
programme.desc: Johnny jokes about Gerald Ford and political slogans and sits down with Phyllis George.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (9/13/74)
programme.desc: Animal expert and advocate Joan Embery brings some fascinating creatures into the studio.
